name: Shaman (Nico Padua)
description:
In this Hack and Slash RPG, discover and embrace your shamanistic powers as Alejandro, a half Filipino - Half Spanish conquistador.    Having been saved from a shipwreck by some locals, you try to uncover the mystery that envelopes the local town as they ask you for help.    

This was a student project made in the Academy of Interactive Entertainment.
